column2: How do I summon a daemonic host and wreak havoc on the world?
Openly turn to Chaos, and summon a daemonic host!

To be worthy of the Blood God's attentions you must be a be a High-Magus of Khorne. Hold a grand rite or donate to the cult's coffers, and in time, he will bless you with his power and send armies to aid you depending on how strong the Winds of Chaos are.
Do you wish to openly serve Khorne, and enact a ritual that will open a portal to the Realm of Chaos? (Be warned: There is no going back from this choice, once made)
BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD!!!
No, now is not the opportune time...

This ruler has been a secret servant of the Ruinous Powers for some time now, and has finally proclaimed his allegiance. He or she has summoned a daemonic army and is preparing to wage a war of conquest!
By the gods...!
How do I summon a daemonic host and wreak havoc on the world?
Openly turn to Chaos, and summon a daemonic host!

To be worthy of the Grandfather Nurgle's attentions, the Winds of Chaos must be strong and you must be a be a High-Magus of Nurgle. Hold a grand rite or donate to the cult's coffers, and in time, he will bless you with his power and send armies to aid you.
Do you wish to openly serve Nurgle, and enact a ritual that will open a portal to the Realm of Chaos? (Be warned: There is no going back from this choice, once made)
FLIES FOR THE PLAGUE LORD!

To be worthy of the Prince of Pleasure's attentions, the Winds of Chaos must be strong and you must be a be a High-Magus of Slaanesh. Hold a grand rite or donate to the cult's coffers, and in time, he will bless you with his power and send armies to aid you.
Do you wish to openly serve Slaanesh, and enact a ritual that will open a portal to the Realm of Chaos? (Be warned: There is no going back from this choice, once made)
ALL PRAISE SLAANESH!
No, now is not the opportune time...

To be worthy of the Lord of Change's attentions, the Winds of Chaos must be strong and you must be a be a High-Magus of Tzeentch. Hold a grand rite or donate to the cult's coffers, and in time, he will bless you with his power and send armies to aid you.
Do you wish to openly serve Tzeentch, and enact a ritual that will open a portal to the Realm of Chaos? (Be warned: There is no going back from this choice, once made)
ALL MUST SERVE THE ARCHITECT OF FATE!

To be worthy of the Chaos Gods attentions, the Winds of Chaos must be strong and you must be a be a High-Magus of the Dark Gods. Hold a grand rite or donate to the cult's coffers, and in time, he will bless you with his power and send armies to aid you.
Do you wish to openly serve the Chaos Gods, and enact a ritual that will open a portal to the Realm of Chaos? (Be warned: There is no going back from this choice, once made)
THE WORLD SHALL FALL!

In your dreams Nurgle, Lord of Death and Decay calls to you... 'The world is falling, it is corrupt, dying... embrace it, my child... embrace your destiny...' you hear a voice calling, and maggots crawl up from the ground, greeting you...
I'll never serve the Ruinous Powers!
I shall be a willing servant of Nurgle, the Plaguefather!

In your dreams Slaanesh, Lord of Lust, Greed, Pleasure, and Pain comes to you... 'Pleasure and pain undying, eternal life, eternal beauty...' you hear a voice calling and an almost irresistible daemonette approaches you...
I'll never serve the Ruinous Powers!
I'll become a willing servant of Slaanesh, the Prince of Pleasure!

In your dreams Tzeentch, Lord of Change, Architect of Fate comes to you... 'Power, eternal life, dominion over all...' you hear a voice calling you see before you a grand destiny, if only you would serve him...
I'll never serve the Ruinous Powers!
I'll become a willing servant of Tzeentch, the Architect of Fate!

In your dreams Khorne, God of Rage, Violence, and Hate comes to you... 'War - war unending, bloodshed eternal, glory undying...' you hear a voice calling you, and a vision of yourself as the greatest warlord of the age appears...
I'll never serve the Ruinous Powers!
I'll become a willing servant of Khorne, the Blood God!

In your dreams, daemons of all shapes and forms come to you... They tell you of the true state of the world and of the lies you have been told about the gods. They offer you unimaginable power if you renounce what you know and serve the true gods of the world: Khorne, Nurgle, Tzeentch, & Slaanesh.
I'll never serve the Ruinous Powers!
I'll become a willing servant of the Dark Gods!
Now that you serve Nurgle, you must do his bidding in order to advance in his favour and gain new powers from him. You have access to a new cultist decision menu.
Now that you serve Slaanesh, you must do his bidding in order to advance in his favour and gain new powers from him. You have access to a new cultist decision menu.
Now that you serve Tzeentch, you must do his bidding in order to advance in his favour and gain new powers from him. You have access to a new cultist decision menu.
Now that you serve Khorne, you must do his bidding in order to advance in his favour and gain new powers from him. You have access to a new cultist decision menu.
Now that you serve Chaos Undivided, you must do the bidding of the Dark Gods in order to advance in favour and gain new powers from them. You have access to a new cultist decision menu.

With the help of other acolytes and children of the Plaguefather, you have succeeded in placing several artifacts of Nurgle in the chambers of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHeCap] should be feeling the Plaguelord's love even now. It is inevitable that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] will join us soon...
I'll bide my time...
it seems [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is not quite ready for the gifts of Grandfather Nurgle.
Let us give [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] one of Nurgle's gifts.
This will help [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] see the joy one can receive from the Lord of Decay.
The time has come to show [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] the glory of Father Nurgle.

Over the past few days you have been hearing voices and having strange dreams of plague victims cavorting in piles of filth, even as their flesh rots away. At first you questioned your own sanity, but this morning you awoke to find you had contracted a horrible disease!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap], no!

Over the past few days you have been hearing voices and having strange dreams of plague victims cavorting in piles of filth, even as their flesh rots away. However, today you received an anonymous message: 'We can help you. Follow these directions and come alone...'
No, never!
As awful as this is, nothing good could happen by going to the sewers alone at night.
Fine! Anything to stop these nightmares.

You sent [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] an anonymous message to meet you alone in the sewers, but [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] never showed up. Perhaps [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is not yet ready to embrace Nurgle. However, all come before the Maggot Lord eventually.
All glory to Father Nurgle!

You sent [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] an anonymous message to meet you alone in the sewers, and [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] stands before you. [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is covered in filth and looks half-mad, but they shall soon find solace in the arms of the Plaguefather.
Come now, dear friend, Papa Nurgle will make things right...

You follow the directions to the letter and go alone into some sewer, deep underground. You soon find yourself surrounded by hooded figures in filthy, decaying robes. The plague-ridden figures begin to chant words of power that you cannot resist...
Nurgle! Plaguefather! Lord of Decay! I shall serve you, just end my pain...

With the help of other acolytes and devotees of She Who Thirsts, you have succeeded in placing several artifacts of Slaanesh in the chambers of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHeCap] should be experiencing the ecstasy of the Master of Excess even now. This pleasure will surely cause [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] to join us soon...
Let us invite [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] to a party where we can show them the joys of the Prince of Pleasure.
The time has come to show [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] the sensation of the Lord of Delights.

You have been invited to a feast, but you soon notice that this is no ordinary party. You see some of the other guests begin to overindulge in food and wine while others start performing lewd and licentious acts to themselves and others...
Time to leave!
This is great, I'm staying!

You invited [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] to a party where you made sure that the mood would turn to more extreme activities. However, it turns out that [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] left early and didn't partake in the festivities.
[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHisCap] loss. I'll keep trying.

You invited [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] to a party where you made sure that the mood would turn to more carnal activities. Luckily [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] enjoyed [Root.PlotTarget.GetHimselfHerself], and will soon follow the ways of the Lord of Dark Delights!
The Master of Ecstasy will be pleased!

Lately you have been haunted by unbearably pleasurable dreams where you engage in unspeakable acts with impossibly beautiful creatures with the features of both men and women. However, today you received an anonymous message: 'We can help you. Follow these directions and come alone...'
No, never!
Going to a brothel alone at night will only make things worse.
Maybe there's something to this message.
I could perhaps get some 'relief' at the brothel as well.

You sent [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] an anonymous message to meet you alone in an isolated brothel, but [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] never showed up. Perhaps [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is not yet ready to embrace Slaanesh. However, no one can resist the Prince of Pleasure forever.
Soon all will serve Slaanesh.

You sent [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] an anonymous message to meet you alone in an isolated brothel, and now [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] stands before you. You can see [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] desire for more sensation in [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] eyes as you begin to instruct [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] in the ways of the Lord of Dark Delights.
We welcome you!

You follow the instructions to the letter and go alone to a remote brothel. There you see people engaging in all manner of unspeakable acts. As they moan and cry out dark words power, you find yourself unable to resist the temptation the words bring...
Slaanesh! Prince of Chaos! Lord of Excess! I shall follow you into a world of endless sensations.

With the help of other acolytes and followers of the Changer of Ways, you have succeeded in placing several artifacts of Tzeentch in the chambers of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHeCap] should be filled with the ambition of the Architect of Fate even now. [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] cannot escape change and will join us soon...
Let us send [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] this book describing the true state of things.
The time has come to show [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] the splendour of the Master of Deceit.
A book without a title was pushed into my hands by a hooded man clad in midnight blue. Something was said, but was lost in the confusion. The book was still there.
Hey... wait!
It wants me to read it...
Burn it! It is clearly a heretical text.
[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] has the book in his possession, and your agents inform you that [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] has spent a great deal of time lately trying to decipher its secrets.
Excellent! Soon, he will be ready to accept the ways of the Great Mutator.
[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] had the book in his possession, but your agents inform you that [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] has burned it without opening it!
Only a fool would try escape the schemes of the Great Conspirator.

Lately you have been haunted by maniacal dreams filled with riotous colours and creature beyond imagining, while your waking moments are filled with runaway daydreams and intricate plans. However, today you received an anonymous message: 'We can help you achieve your goals. Follow these directions and come alone...'
No, never! Nothing comes for free, there is always catch...
If this person at the inn can help me, I would be stupid not to go.

You sent [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] an anonymous message to meet you alone in an isolated inn, but [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] never showed up. Perhaps [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is not yet ready to embrace Tzeentch. However, none can escape the Changer of Ways.
Soon all will serve Tzeentch!

You sent [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] an anonymous message to meet you alone in an isolated inn, and [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] stands before you. You speak to him of Tzeentch and the power that awaits, and soon enough, [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] gives in...
We welcome you!

You follow the instructions to the letter and go alone to a remote inn. There you find a group of hooded people, each wearing a different sinister mask. They begin whispering fell words of power and you know you need only take their potency for your own...
Tzeentch! Father of Lies! the Great Mutator! I shall devote myself to your ever-changing ways.

With the help of other acolytes and fanatics of the Blood God, you have succeeded in placing several artifacts of Khorne in the chambers of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHeCap] should be filled with the rage of Brass Lord even now. This blood-lust will no doubt cause [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] to join us soon...
Let us send [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] this weapon dedicated to the Lord of the Skull Throne.
The time has come to show [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] the glory of Khorne.
A package arrived for you today that contained a masterfully crafted weapon. However, no matter how many times you clean it, you can't seem to remove the bloodstains the blade...
Bloodstains never injured anyone, it's the injury that makes the bloodstain. Ha!
This is an ill omen. I don't care how fine a weapon it is, destroy it!

You delivered the weapon to [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName], and your agents inform you that [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] has grown quite fond of it, using it upon any who displease [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim].
BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD! SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE!
You delivered the weapon to [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName], however your agents inform you that [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] destroyed soon after. HOW DARE THEY DENY KHORNE!
BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD! SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE!

Lately you have been haunted by dreams of endless slaughter. In them you crush your enemies and see them driven before you. You awake as you hear the lamentations of their women. However, today you received an anonymous message: 'We can help you. Follow these directions and come alone...'
No, never!
What good could come of going to fighting pit alone at night?
Sounds Fun!
Maybe I can even bash some heads too...

You sent [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] an anonymous message to meet you alone in an isolated fighting pit, but [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] never showed up. Perhaps [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is not yet ready to shed blood for Khorne. However, all will shed blood for the Blood God before long.
BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD! SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE!

You sent [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] an anonymous message to meet you alone in an isolated fighting pit, and [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] stands before you. You see the bloodlust in [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] eyes and tell [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] to take [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] fill...
BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD! SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE!

You follow the instructions to the letter and go alone to a remote fighting pit. There a person cloaked in red tells you to take your fill killing the captives you see around you. Their screams are the sweetest sound you ever heard...
BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD! SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE!

With the help of various backers - both witting and unwitting - you are now in a position to bring the gifts of the Plaguefather to [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s homelands. Grandfather Nurgle will be pleased!
All should share in the gifts of the Plague Lord

An outbreak of a strange and virulent disease has occurred in one of your provinces. The unnatural spread of it suggests this is the work of cultists devoted to the Ruinous Powers! All you can do now is try to contain the outbreak and redouble your efforts to root out cultists in your midst!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] save us from these plagues!

With the help of various backers - both witting and unwitting - you are now in a position to incite a tribe of feral beastmen to ravage [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s homelands. Khorne will be pleased by the strife this causes!
BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD! SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE!

Your marshal informs you that a tribe of beastmen has suddenly arrived and started attacking your holdings, raiding villages and burning homesteads. The sudden nature of this suggests that they were guided there by cultists devoted to the Ruinous Powers! Worse still, the peasants are blaming you for the lack of protection.
From the fury of the beastmen, [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap], deliver us!

With the help of various backers - both witting and unwitting - you are now in a position to taint the food and water supplies in [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s land with Warpdust, which will lead to an increase in horrific mutations. Tzeentch will be pleased!
Glory to the Great Mutator!

Your steward tells you that traces of Warpdust have been found to be poisoning your land. Evidence suggests this is the work of cultists devoted to the Ruinous Powers! We will likely see an increased number of mutations, perhaps even in your own court, until the Warpdust dissipates!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] protect us from the gaze of the Dark Gods!

With the help of various backers - both witting and unwitting - you are now in a position to subvert [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s lands with carefully prepared intoxicants and public agitators. Slaanesh will be pleased!
Glory to the Prince of Pleasure!

Your steward informs you that a sudden rash of riots, bizarre festivals and even spontaneous public orgies have struck a particular region. The peasants seem to drink, whore, and gamble away all their income, and even some of the better bred citizens do the same. It is suspected that it is no mere passing craze, but a deliberate attempt by servants of the Dark Gods to weaken your rule.
But... they'll still pay taxes, right?

Khorne, the Blood God, demands that you do his bidding. What service shall you render the Lord of the Skull Throne? Once you've completed your task, you  will need to wait 1000 days before undertaking another, so as to not arouse suspicion.
I will donate money to our cult's coffers.
What would it take to perform the Rite of the Crimson Skull?
Prepare to initiate the Rite of the Crimson Skull!
Show More Choices / Close Menu
It has been some time since you've performed your last service for the Blood God. It should be safe to undertake another service for him without arousing too much suspicion...
A fellow servant of Khorne has given you some money in recognition of all the blood you have spilled in the Blood God's name. Use these funds bring Khorne even greater glory!
Your service to Blood God has been recognized by others in his service. You are no longer a mere Acolyte, but a Magus in the cult of Khorne. Congratulations!
BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD! SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE!
You have reached even higher into the cult's hierarchy, and you are now considered a High-Magus of Khorne. Congratulations!
BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD! SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE!

The Rite of the Crimson Skull requires that you be a High-Magus of Khorne and have eight prisoners of noble blood ready for sacrifice. Once the rite is completed, the Winds of Chaos will be strengthened and you will be granted the Blood God's favour.
I see.

You are a a High-Magus of Khorne and have eight prisoners of noble blood in your dungeons, which means you have everything you need to perform the Rite of the Crimson Skull. Shall we gather other servants of the Blood God so we can perform this ritual?
Naturally!

[From.GetBestName], a High-Magus of Khorne, has invited you to take part in the Rite of the Crimson Skull! By ritually sacrificing eight highborn prisoners the Winds of Chaos will grow stronger and all in attendance will gain favour with the Blood God.
I shall join you in your ritual. BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD! SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE!

In a wooded clearing in a secure location, you begin the Rite of the Crimson Skull. Your prisoners are brought forth, and to the cheers of the crowd, their faces are ripped off while still alive and screaming. The crowd descends on the prisoners and the are ripped apart with bare hands, drenching everyone in the still warm blood. Khorne will be pleased today!
BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD! SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE!

One night your captors drag you from your cell, and lead you to a stone altar in wooded clearing. You soon realize you are surrounded by cultists of the Ruinous Powers and you are about to be sacrificed! You can only scream with terror as your face is ripped from your skull!

In a wooded clearing in a secure location, the Rite of the Crimson Skull begins. The prisoners are brought forth, and to the cheers of the crowd, their faces are ripped off while still alive and screaming. The crowd descends on the prisoners and they are ripped apart with bare hands, drenching everyone in the still warm blood. Khorne will be pleased today!
BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD! SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE!

Nurgle, the Maggot Lord, demands that you do his bidding. What service shall you render the Plaguefather? Once you've completed your task, you  will need to wait 1000 days before undertaking another, so as to not arouse suspicion.
I will donate to our cult's coffers.
What would it take to host a Putrid Feast?
Prepare to initiate the Putrid Feast!
Show More Choices / Close Menu
It has been some time since you've performed your last service for Grandfather Nurgle. It should be safe to undertake another service for him without arousing too much suspicion...
A fellow servant of Nurgle has given you some money in recognition of all the plagues you've shared in the Maggot Lord's name. Use these funds bring Papa Nurgle even greater glory!
Your service to the Plaguefather has been recognized by others in his service. You are no longer a mere Acolyte, but a Magus in the cult of Nurgle. Congratulations!
You have reached even higher into the cult's hierarchy, and you are now considered a High-Magus of Nurgle. Congratulations!

The ritual of the Putrid Feast requires that you be a High-Magus of Nurgle and have seven prisoners of noble blood ready for sacrifice. Once the rite is completed, the Winds of Chaos will be strengthened and you will be granted the Maggot Lord's favour.

You are a a High-Magus of Nurgle and have seven prisoners of noble blood in your dungeons, which means you have everything you need to host a Putrid Feast. Shall we gather other servants of the Plaguefather so we can perform this ritual?

[From.GetBestName], a High-Magus of Nurgle, has invited you to take part in a Putrid Feast! By ritually devouring seven highborn prisoners, the Winds of Chaos will grow stronger, and all in attendance will gain favour with the Plaguelord.
I will gladly attend your Putrid Feast. It can only bring us closer to Grandfather Nurgle!

At a grand gala in a secure location, you begin the Putrid Feast. Your prisoners are brought forth, and to the cheers of the crowd, their rotting and diseased flesh is devoured by all in attendance while the prisoners are still alive. Nurgle will be pleased today!

After days of being kept in conditions which caused your flesh to rot and being forcibly infected with horrible diseases, you are finally dragged from your cells up to a great feasthall. You soon realize you are surrounded by cultists of the Ruinous Powers and you will be the main course. You can only scream with terror as you are eaten alive!

Slaanesh, the Prince of Pleasure, demands that you do her bidding. What service shall you render to She Who Thirsts? Once you've completed your task, you  will need to wait 1000 days before undertaking another, so as to not arouse suspicion.
I will donate to our cult 's coffers.
What would it take to host a Blood Orgy?
Prepare to initiate a Blood Orgy!
Show More Choices / Close Menu
It has been some time since you've performed your last service for Slaanesh. It should be safe to undertake another service for her without arousing too much suspicion...
A fellow servant of Slaanesh has given you some money in recognition of sensations you have had in the Prince of Pleasure's name. Use these funds to bring Slaanesh even greater glory!
Your service to She Who Thirsts has been recognized by others in his service. You are no longer a mere Acolyte, but a Magus in the cult of Slaanesh. Congratulations!
You have reached even higher into the cult's hierarchy, and you are now considered a High-Magus of Slaanesh. Congratulations!

The rite of the Blood Orgy requires that you be a High-Magus of Slaanesh and have six prisoners of noble blood ready for sacrifice. Once the rite is completed, the Winds of Chaos will be strengthened and you will be granted the Prince of Pleasure's favour.

You are a a High-Magus of Slaanesh and have six prisoners of noble blood in your dungeons, which means you have everything you need to host a Blood Orgy. Shall we gather other servants of She Who Thirsts so we can perform this ritual?

[From.GetBestName], a High-Magus of Slaanesh, has invited you to take part in a Blood Orgy! By ritually devouring seven highborn prisoners, the Winds of Chaos will grow stronger, and all in attendance will gain favour with the Prince of Pleasure.
I will gladly attend your Blood Orgy. The pleasure will be exquisite!

At a grand gala in a secure location, you begin the Blood Orgy. Your drugged prisoners are brought forth and violated in every way imaginable by all in attendance until the prisoners' bodies literally come apart at the seams. Slaanesh will be pleased today!

After days of being forcibly fed drugs enhance your senses to tortuous levels, you are dragged naked out of your cell and taken to a great gala. You soon realize you are surrounded by cultists of the Ruinous Powers and they begin disrobing. You can only scream with terror as they violate your body in unimaginable ways!

At a grand gala in a secure location, the Blood Orgy begins. The drugged prisoners are brought forth and violated in every way imaginable by all in attendance until the prisoners' bodies literally come apart at the seams. Slaanesh will be pleased today!

Tzeentch, the Architect of Fate, demands that you do his bidding. What service shall you render the Changer of Ways? Once you've completed your task, you will need to wait 1000 days before undertaking another, so as to not arouse suspicion.
I will donate to our cult's coffers.
What would it take to perform the Rite of Pure Form?
Prepare to initiate the Rite of Pure Form!
Show More Choices / Close Menu
It has been some time since you've performed your last service for the Great Mutator. It should be safe to undertake another service for him without arousing too much suspicion...
A fellow servant of Tzeentch has given you some money in recognition of all change you have brought in the Architect of Fate's name. Use these funds bring Tzeentch even greater glory!
Your service to the Changer of Ways has been recognized by others in his service. You are no longer a mere Acolyte, but a Magus in the cult of Tzeentch. Congratulations!
You have reached even higher into the cult's hierarchy, and you are now considered a High-Magus of Tzeentch. Congratulations!

The Rite of Pure Form requires that you be a High-Magus of Tzeentch and have nine prisoners of noble blood ready for sacrifice. Once the rite is completed, the Winds of Chaos will be strengthened and you will be granted the Great Mutator's favour.

You are a a High-Magus of Tzeentch and have nine prisoners of noble blood in your dungeons, which means you have everything you need to perform the Rite of Pure Form. Shall we gather other servants of the Changer of Ways so we can perform this ritual?

[From.GetBestName], a High-Magus of Tzeentch, has invited you to take part in the Rite of Pure Form! By ritually sacrificing nine highborn prisoners the Winds of Chaos will grow stronger and all in attendance will gain favour with the Architect of Fate.
I shall join you in your ritual. May everyone have their form purified under the Great Mutator gaze!

At a grand gala in a secure location, you begin the Rite of Pure Form. Your prisoners are brought forth, and to the cheers of the crowd, they are forcibly fed Warpstone. Before long the bodies of the prisoners begin to change and mutate, becoming deformed monstrosities before finally succumbing to death's embrace. Tzeentch will be pleased today!
All hail the Architect of Fate!

One night your are dragged out of your cell and taken to a great gala. You soon realize you are surrounded by cultists of the Ruinous Powers as they begin force feeding you Warpstone! You can only scream with terror as your body and mind mutate into forms no person should ever experience!

At a grand gala in a secure location, the Rite of Pure Form begins. The prisoners are brought forth, and to the cheers of the crowd, they are forcibly fed Warpstone. Before long the bodies of the prisoners begin to change and mutate, becoming deformed monstrosities before finally succumbing to death's embrace. Tzeentch will be pleased today!
All hail the Architect of Fate!

The Dark Gods of Chaos demand that you do their bidding. What service shall you render the Ruinous Powers? Once you've completed your task, you will need to wait 1000 days before undertaking another, so as to not arouse suspicion.
I will donate to our cult's coffers.
What would it take to perform the Rite of Blasphemous Offering?
Prepare to initiate the Rite of Blasphemous Offering!
Show More Choices / Close Menu
It has been some time since you've performed your last service for the Dark Gods. It should be safe to undertake another service for them without arousing too much suspicion...
A fellow servant of Chaos has given you some money in recognition of all you have done in the name of the Dark Gods. Use these funds bring Chaos Undivided even greater glory!
Your service to the Dark Gods has been recognized by others in their service. You are no longer a mere Acolyte, but a Magus in the cult of Chaos Undivided. Congratulations!
You have reached even higher into the cult's hierarchy, and you are now considered a High-Magus of Chaos Undivided. Congratulations!

The Rite of Blasphemous Offering requires that you be a High-Magus of Chaos Undivided and have eight prisoners of noble blood ready for sacrifice. Once the rite is completed, the Winds of Chaos will be strengthened and you will be granted the favour of the Dark Gods.

You are a a High-Magus of Chaos Undivided and have eight prisoners of noble blood in your dungeons, which means you have everything you need to perform the Rite of Blasphemous Offering. Shall we gather other servants of the Dark Gods so we can perform this ritual?

[From.GetBestName], a High-Magus of Chaos Undivided, has invited you to take part in the Rite of Blasphemous Offering! By ritually sacrificing eight highborn prisoners the Winds of Chaos will grow stronger and all in attendance will gain favour with the Dark Gods.
I shall join you in your ritual. May we all be blessed in the sight of Gods of Chaos!

At a grand gala in a secure location, you begin the Rite of Blasphemous Offering. Your prisoners are brought forth, and to the cheers of the crowd, profane symbols are carved into their flesh. Before long the prisoners are possessed by daemons who scream blasphemy after blasphemy before slitting their own throats. The Dark Gods will be pleased today!
All hail the Dark Gods!

One night your are dragged out of your cell and taken to a great gala. You soon realize you are surrounded by cultists of the Ruinous Powers as they begin force carving symbols into your flesh! You feel a Daemon take control of your body as they use your tongue to utter blasphemies against [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] before they kill you!

At a grand gala in a secure location, the Rite of Blasphemous Offering begins. The prisoners are brought forth, and to the cheers of the crowd, profane symbols are carved into their flesh. Before long the prisoners are possessed by daemons who scream blasphemy after blasphemy before slitting their own throats. The Dark Gods will be pleased today!
All hail the Dark Gods!

The Crimson Skull
column3: Les Adeptes de Lucifer
column4: Kinder Luzifers
column6: siervos de Lucifer

column2: The Cult of the Crimson Skull is a secretive organisation that infiltrates warrior fraternities to transform them into unwitting tools of Khorne. As with any of Khornes bloody followers, the Crimson Skulls perform blood sacrifice and spread mayhem.
column3: Ceux qui servent le Grand Adversaire se cachent au milieu de nous, consacrant leurs dépravations et perfidies à leur Seigneur Satan. Chaque transgression est un hymne, chaque assassinat un rugissement de défi contre la parole [Root.GetHighGodDuDelaDes]. Lucifer récompense généreusement de tels sombres sacrements  les sorciers sont dits dotés d'une durée de vie anormale et de pouvoirs démoniaques.
column4: Die Jünger des Antichrist verstecken sich in unserer Mitte und huldigen in perfider Verderbtheit Satan, ihrem Herrn. Jede Sünde ist ihnen Hymnus, jeder Mord ein Aufschrei gegen das Wort von [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]. Luzifer belohnt die Priester seiner dunklen Sakramente fürstlich: So heißt es, dass er Hexen ein unnatürlich langes Leben schenkt und ihnen alle möglichen dämonischen Kräfte verleiht.
column6: Aquellos que sirven al Gran Adversario se ocultan entre nosotros, dedicando sus depravaciones y perfidias a su señor, Satanás. Cada transgresión es un himno cada asesinato es un rugido de desafío contra la palabra de [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]. Lucifer recompensa esos sacramentos oscuros generosamente: se dice que las brujas están dotadas de una vida antinatural y de toda clase de poderes demoníacos.

column2: The Children of Doom

column4: Kinder Luzifers
column6: siervos de Lucifer

column2: The Children of Doom are a secret society of cultists that proclaims that the only salvation left remains in Nurgle, casting him as a figure that alleviates suffering rather than being the cause of it. By embracing Nurgle, these cultists believe they will be spared the worst diseases, and will survive to a new era of comfort and joy.

column2: Of the active Chaos cults, none are as powerful or as ambitious as the Purple Hand of Tzeentch. This vast and well-connected organisation has agents scattered all across the World and in all the important inner circles of most of the nations of Man. They control merchants, nobles, artisans, and commoners alike.

column4: Kinder Luzifers
column6: siervos de Lucifer

column2: The Sybarites are a mysterious organisation dedicated solely to the pursuit of exquisite pleasure and terrifying pain, in the name of Slaanesh. They believe both experiences are but reflections of the same thing: the limits of Human endurance.The Sybarites include members of both genders, and they welcome all into their fold, from the mildly curious to the downright depraved.

column4: Kinder Luzifers
column6: siervos de Lucifer

column2: One of the most heretical and blasphemous Chaos cults in existance, the Lost and the Damned worship all four of the Ruinous Powers. Their structure and rituals are nockeries those of the mainstream cults, and their demagogic lithurgy is full of blasphemies against Sigmar, Ulric and other gods of the Old World and beyond .

column2: I'm having dinner and plenty of drinks with [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledName] tonight. It's lovely, yet what I am most charmed by is [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName] [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetHerselfHimself]. Why else would I not immediately stop our conversation, which has slowly begun to touch upon some almost heretical ideas, questioning the might of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]?
column3: Je mange et bois en compagnie de [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledName]. C'est plaisant, bien que ce qui m'intéresse le plus c'est [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName] [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetLuiElle]-même. Autrement, pourquoi n'aurais-je pas immédiatement mis fin à la conversation, qui a lentement commencé à contenir des idées quasiment hérétiques, par la contestation du salut [Root.GetHighGodDuDelaDes] ?
column4: Ich esse heute mit [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledName] zu Abend und wir haben viel zu trinken. Es ist schön, doch was mich am meisten bezaubert, ist [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName] selbst. Weshalb sonst würde ich unsere Konversation weiterführen, die sich mittlerweile um beinah ketzerisches Gedankengut dreht, und die Erlösung durch [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] in Frage stellt?
column6: Esta noche voy a cenar y a beber con [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledName]. Es un plan encantador, aunque lo que más me atrae de la idea es la compañía. ¿Por qué si no iba a continuar una conversación que empezaba a abordar temas sacrílegos, como si creía en la salvación de [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]?

column2: Why does [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] ignore us ?
column3: Si on ne pose pas de questions, pourquoi [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] nous a-t-il rendus curieux ?
column4: Wenn wir keine Fragen stellen, warum hat uns [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] dann einen Hang zur Neugier gegeben?
column6: ¿Por qué nos dio [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] la curiosidad si no podemos preguntarnos cosas?

column2: You think it's a great discussion, fueled by alcohol or not.\n
column3: Vous pensez que, alimentée par l'alcool ou non, c'est une grande discussion.\n
column4: Ihr haltet das für ein fantastisches Gespräch, ob nun der Alkohol verantwortlich ist oder nicht.\n
column6: La conversación te parece interesantísima, aunque esté regada con alcohol.\n

column2: We should not speak of this, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName].
column3: Nous ne devrions pas parler de ceci, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName].
column4: Wir sollten nicht darüber reden, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName].
column6: No debemos hablar de esas cosas, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName].

column2: You would never question the authority of the almighty.\n
column3: Vous ne contesteriez jamais le Tout-Puissant.\n
column4: Ihr würdet nie die Autorität des Allmächtigen in Frage stellen.\n
column6: No te atreves a cuestionar la autoridad de su dios.\n

column2: Meeting with [chaos_cult_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], I made sure to only cautiously question the absolute power of [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHerHis] almighty [chaos_cult_recruit.Religion.GetHighGodName]... Thankfully, it seems that my carefully chosen words had the desired effect on [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHerHim]. From [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHerHis] glittering eyes I got the distinct impression that [chaos_cult_recruit.GetSheHe] enjoyed the philosophical aspect of our conversion.
column3: Parlant avec [chaos_cult_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], je mets prudemment en doute le pouvoir absolu [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHighGodDuDelaDes]... Heureusement, il semble que mes mots, choisis avec prudence, ont eu l'effet désiré sur [chaos_cult_recruit.GetLuiElle]. Ses yeux étincelants m'ont donné la nette impression qu'[chaos_cult_recruit.GetIlElle] aimait l'aspect philosophique de notre conversion.
column4: Bei dem Treffen mit [chaos_cult_recruit.GetTitledFirstName] vergewisserte ich mich, nur vorsichtig die absolute Macht von seinem/ihrem allmächtigen Gott in Frage zu stellen ... Glücklicherweise schienen meine sorgfältig gewählten Worte den gewünschten Effekt auf [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHerHim] zu haben. Seine/Ihre strahlenden Augen machten mir besonders den Eindruck, dass [chaos_cult_recruit.GetSheHe] die philosophischen Aspekte unserer Konversation zu schätzen wusste.
column6: En el encuentro con [chaos_cult_recruit.GetTitledFirstName] cuestioné con cautela el poder absoluto de su dios, [chaos_cult_recruit.Religion.GetHighGodName]. Afortunadamente, parece que mis palabras tuvieron el efecto deseado, pude ver en sus ojos que le interesaba el tono filosófico de nuestra conversación.

column2: Meeting with [chaos_cult_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], I made sure to only cautiously question the absolute power of [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHerHis] almighty [chaos_cult_recruit.Religion.GetHighGodName]... Regretfully, it seems that my words only irritated my [chaos_cult_recruit.GetRootRelation]  from the steely look [chaos_cult_recruit.GetSheHe] finally gave me, I should probably steer clear of [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHerHim] for now.
column3: Parlant avec [chaos_cult_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], je mets prudemment en doute le pouvoir absolu [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHighGodDuDelaDes]... Malheureusement, il semble que mes mots ont seulement irrité m[chaos_cult_recruit.GetOnA] [chaos_cult_recruit.GetRootRelation]. Avec le regard glacial qu'[chaos_cult_recruit.GetIlElle] m'a lancé, je devrais vraisemblablement me tenir éloigné[Root.GetNoneE] d[chaos_cult_recruit.GetEluiElle] pour l'instant.
column4: Bei dem Treffen mit [chaos_cult_recruit.GetTitledFirstName] vergewisserte ich mich, nur vorsichtig die absolute Macht von seinem/ihrem allmächtigen Gott in Frage zu stellen ... Leider schienen meine Worte [chaos_cult_recruit.GetTitledFirstName] nur zu irritieren. Dem eisernen Blick nach zu urteilen, den [chaos_cult_recruit.GetSheHe] mir zuwarf, sollte ich ihm/ihr wohl vorerst aus dem Weg gehen.
column6: En el encuentro con [chaos_cult_recruit.GetTitledFirstName] cuestioné con cautela el poder absoluto de su dios, [chaos_cult_recruit.Religion.GetHighGodName]. Lamentablemente, creo que mis palabras irritaron a mi [chaos_cult_recruit.GetRootRelation]. Me lanzó una mirada helada que me dio a entender que debo alejarme por ahora.

column2: A sensible [chaos_cult_recruit.GetManWoman], [chaos_cult_recruit.GetFirstName].
column3: Un[chaos_cult_recruit.GetNoneE] [chaos_cult_recruit.GetManWoman] raisonnable, [chaos_cult_recruit.GetFirstName].
column4: Ein vernünftiger Mensch, diese/r [chaos_cult_recruit.GetFirstName].
column6: [chaos_cult_recruit.GetFirstName] es una persona sensata.

column2: Continue your endeavor to recruit §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to [Root.Society.GetName].\n
column3: Vous poursuivez vos efforts visant à recruter §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! pour [Root.Society.GetName].\n
column4: Führt Euer Vorhaben, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! für den "[Root.Society.GetName]"-Zirkel zu rekrutieren, fort.\n"
column6: Sigues intentando reclutar a §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! para [Root.Society.GetName].\n

column2: I'm not sure [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHerHis] sentiments were sincere...
column3: Je ne suis pas sûr[Root.GetNoneE] que ses sentiments étaient sincères...
column4: Ich bin nicht sicher, ob seine/ihre Gefühle ehrlich gemeint waren ...
column6: No sé si sus sentimientos eran sinceros.

column2: You end your endeavor to recruit §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to [Root.Society.GetName].\n
column3: Vous stoppez vos efforts visant à recruter §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! pour [Root.Society.GetName].\n
column4: Ihr stellt Euer Vorhaben, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! für den "[Root.Society.GetName]"-Zirkel zu rekrutieren, ein.\n"
column6: Dejas de tratar de reclutar a §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! para [Root.Society.GetName].\n

column2: Disappointing.
column3: Décevant.
column4: Enttäuschend.
column6: Qué decepción.

column2: Walking the palisades of my [Root.GetCapitalHolding] I am joined by [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. I find myself agreeing with a lot of the concepts [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetSheHe] presents  the futility of prayer particularly resonates with me. Suddenly, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetSheHe] turns to me and presses a small leather pouch into my hand. "My [Root.GetLordLady], will you carry this with you, for protection?"
column3: Longeant les palissades [Root.GetCapitalHoldingDuDela], je suis rejoint[Root.GetNoneE] par [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. Je suis d'accord avec les nombreuses idées qu'[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetIlElle] évoque  l'inutilité de la prière résonne particulièrement en moi. Soudain, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetIlElle] se tourne vers moi, et met dans ma main un petit étui en cuir. « M[Root.GetOnA][Root.GetLordLady], garderez-vous ceci, comme protection ? »
column4: Bei einem Spaziergang über die Palisaden meines Heims schließt sich mir [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] an. Ich bemerke, dass ich vielen Konzepten, die [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetSheHe] mir vorstellt, zustimme. Die Sinnlosigkeit von Gebeten ist mir dabei besonders geläufig. Plötzlich wendet [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetSheHe] sich mir zu und drückt mir einen kleinen Lederbeutel in die Hand. "[Root.GetLordLady], werdet Ihr das zu Eurem Schutz bei Euch tragen?"
column6: Mientras daba un paseo con [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] por la empalizada me he dado cuenta de que estoy de acuerdo con muchas de las ideas que me plantea, sobre todo en la futilidad de rezar. De repente, se ha acercado y me ha dado un pequeño zurrón de cuero. "¿Me harás el favor de llevar esto para protegerte?"."

column2: I'll keep it hidden, and I thank you, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName].
column3: Je vais le garder caché, et merci, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName].
column4: Ich werde es aufbewahren und ich danke dir, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName].
column6: Lo guardaré en secreto. Muchas gracias, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName].

column2: You encourage the advances made by §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
column3: Vous encouragez §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! à poursuivre dans cette direction.\n
column4: Ihr ermutigt das aufdringliche Verhalten von §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
column6: Animas a §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! a continuar con sus avances.

column2: What is this? I should call you a [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWMagician]!
column3: Qu'est-ce ? Je devrais vous prendre pour un[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetNoneE] [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWMagician] !
column4: Was geht hier vor sich? Du bist ein/e [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWMagician]!
column6: Pero ¿qué es esto? ¡Te debería acusar de brujería!

column2: You distance yourself from §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
column3: Vous vous éloignez de §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
column4: Ihr distanziert Euch von §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
column6: Te distancias de §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n

column2: I've arranged a run-in with [From.GetTitledFirstName] on the palisades of [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetCapitalHolding] today. [From.GetHerHisCap] face lights up upon seeing me and we stay out talking for hours. I offer [From.GetHerHim] a protection spell, in a leather pouch  of course, I do not explain the content... Yet [From.GetSheHe] smiles, accepting the token.
column3: J'ai arrangé une rencontre avec [From.GetTitledFirstName] au niveau des palissades [From.GetCapitalHoldingDuDela] aujourd'hui. Son regard s'illumine en me voyant et nous restons dehors à parler pendant des heures. Je lui offre un sort de protection, dans un étui en cuir  bien sûr, je n'explique pas le contenu... Pourtant, [From.GetIlElle] sourit, et accepte le cadeau symbolique.
column4: Ich habe für heute ein Treffen mit [From.GetTitledFirstName] auf den Palisaden seines/ihres Wohngebiets arrangiert. Sein/Ihr Gesicht erstrahlt, als [From.GetSheHe] mich sieht, und wir unterhalten uns stundenlang im Freien. Ich biete ihm/ihr einen Schutzzauber in einem Lederbeutel an. Natürlich verschweige ich den Inhalt ... Dennoch lächelt [From.GetSheHe] und nimmt das Geschenk an.
column6: He organizado un encuentro con [From.GetTitledFirstName] en la empalizada. Cuando me ha visto se le ha iluminado la cara y hemos hablado durante horas. Le he ofrecido un hechizo de protección en un zurrón de cuero. Eso sí, no le he explicado lo que contiene. Lo ha aceptado con una sonrisa.

column2: I've arranged a run-in with [From.GetTitledFirstName] on the palisades of [From.GetHerHis] [From.Capital.GetHolding] today. [From.GetHerHisCap] face darkens when I again attempt to discuss my world views. I then offer [From.GetHerHim] my favorite protection spell, a chicken leg in a leather pouch  I thought it was harmless enough, but [From.GetSheHe] refuses to accept the gift.
column3: J'ai arrangé une rencontre avec [From.GetTitledFirstName] au niveau des palissades [From.Capital.GetHoldingDuDela] aujourd'hui. Son regard s'assombrit lorsque je tente de parler de ma vision du monde. Je lui offre ensuite mon sort de protection favori, une cuisse de poulet dans un étui en cuir  bien sûr, je n'explique pas le contenu... Je pensais que c'était suffisamment inoffensif, mais [From.GetIlElle] refuse le cadeau.
column4: Ich habe für heute ein Treffen mit [From.GetTitledFirstName] auf den Palisaden seines/ihres Wohngebiets vereinbart. Die Züge seines/ihres Gesichts verdunkeln sich, als ich wieder versuche, meine Sicht der Dinge anzusprechen. Danach biete ich ihm/ihr meinen bevorzugten Schutzzauber an: ein Hühnerbein in einem Lederbeutel. Ich fand, es wäre harmlos genug, doch [From.GetSheHe] will mein Geschenk nicht annehmen.
column6: He organizado un encuentro con [From.GetTitledFirstName] en la empalizada. Ha puesto una mueca de desagrado cuando he tratado de explicarle mis puntos de vista filosóficos. Después, le he ofrecido mi hechizo de protección favorito: una pata de pollo en un zurrón de cuero. Yo pensaba que era un ofrecimiento de lo más inocuo, pero se ha negado a aceptarlo.

column2: [From.GetSheHeCap] just needs one more little push.
column3: [From.GetIlElleCap] a juste besoin d'un petit coup de pouce supplémentaire.
column4: [From.GetSheHeCap] braucht nur noch einen kleinen Ruck.
column6: Necesita un empujoncito.

column2: Invite §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to [Root.Society.GetName].
column3: Vous proposez à §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! de rejoindre [Root.Society.GetName].
column4: Ladet §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! zum "[Root.Society.GetName]"-Kreis ein."
column6: Invitas a §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! a [Root.Society.GetName].

column2: It's been interesting, but I don't think [From.GetSheHe] is ready for more.
column3: C'était intéressant, mais je ne pense pas qu'[From.GetIlElle] soit prêt[From.GetNoneE] pour la suite.
column4: Es war interessant, aber ich glaube nicht, dass [From.GetSheHe] bereit für mehr ist.
column6: Ha sido interesante, pero creo que no podemos seguir insistiendo.

column2: This has been a wasted effort  [From.GetFirstName] is locked in [From.GetHerHis] views.
column3: Ce fut un effort vain  [From.GetFirstName] campe sur ses positions.
column4: Das war vergeudete Mühe. [From.GetFirstName] lässt sich von seinen/ihren Ansichten nicht abbringen.
column6: El esfuerzo ha sido en vano, [From.GetFirstName] se aferra a sus creencias.

column2: What if I told you that all you have been taught to believe in is a lie? [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName] continues, throwing a cautious glance around us before pulling up [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing a scar in the the shape of [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWDevil]'s mark. "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] is a false god, only the power of [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWDevil] is real..."
column3: « Et si je vous disais que tout ce qu'on vous a appris à croire est un mensonge ? », poursuit [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName], tout en jetant un coup d'il autour de nous, avant de remonter sa manche, révélant une cicatrice en forme de pentagramme. « [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] a menti à Adam dans le jardin d'Eden. Rejetez la divinité tyrannique et laissez [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] guider vos pas... »
column4: Was, wenn ich Euch sage, es gäbe einen anderen Weg, Eure Ziele zu verwirklichen?, sagt [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetSheHe] daraufhin, blickt vorsichtig um sich, krempelt dann den Ärmel hoch und offenbart eine Tätowierung, nein, eine Narbe in Form eines umgedrehten Sterns in einem Kreis. Dann sagt [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetSheHe]: "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] ist nicht der einzige Gott mit Macht. Schließt Euch unserem Zirkel an und wir können es Euch zeigen."
column6: Tras echar una mirada furtiva alrededor ha susurrado: ¿Y si te dijera que hay otra forma de lograr tus objetivos?". Se ha levantado la manga y me ha mostrado una cicatriz a modo de tatuaje: un círculo con una estrella boca abajo. "Hay otras fuerzas aparte de [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetSheHe]. Únete a nuestro aquelarre y te las mostraré"."

column2: You truly are a [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWMagician] then? Can you [Root.GetDWReasonToJoin]?
column3: Vous êtes vraiment un[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetNoneE] [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWMagician] alors ? Pouvez-vous [Root.GetDWReasonToJoin] ?
column4: Ihr seid also wirklich ein/e [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWMagician]? Könnt Ihr [Root.GetDWReasonToJoin]?
column6: ¿De verdad practicas la brujería? ¿Podrías [Root.GetDWReasonToJoin]?

column2: You ask §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! how you can begin your journey into this forbidden knowledge.\n
column3: Vous demandez à §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! comment vous pouvez commencer votre voyage vers ce savoir interdit.\n
column4: Ihr fragt §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!, wie Ihr Eure Reise zu diesem verbotenen Wissen beginnen könnt.\n
column6: Le preguntas a §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! cómo puedes iniciar tu andadura en este arte prohibido.\n

column2: That is blasphemy, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName]! Leave my sight, before I call the guards!
column3: C'est du blasphème, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName] ! Hors de ma vue, avant que j'appelle les gardes !
column4: Das ist Blasphemie, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName]! Geh mir aus den Augen, bevor ich die Wachen rufe!
column6: ¡Eso es blasfemia, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName]! ¡Vete de aquí antes de que llame a los guardias!

column2: You dismiss §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! offer and pretend it never happened.\n
column3: Vous rejetez la proposition de §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! et prétendez que cela ne s'est jamais produit.\n
column4: Ihr verwerft das Angebot von §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! und gebt vor, es nie gehört zu haben.\n
column6: Rechazas el ofrecimiento de §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! y finges que nunca ha sucedido.\n

column2: When I revealed the brand on my lower arm, expecting the final hook to sink in, [From.GetFirstName] staggered backwards in shock and made a hand gesture for protection. "That is blasphemy, [Root.GetFirstName]" [From.GetSheHe] said, eyes wide. "Leave my sight, before I call the guards!" [From.GetSheHe] called and it was with reluctance, albeit hastily, that I left.
column3: Lorsque j'ai révélé la marque sur mon avant-bras, m'attendant à ce que [From.GetFirstName] morde enfin à l'hameçon, [From.GetIlElle] a eu un mouvement de recul et fait un geste de la main comme protection. « C'est un blasphème, [Root.GetFirstName] », dit-[From.GetIlElle], les yeux grands ouverts. « Hors de ma vue avant que je n'appelle les gardes ! crie-t-[From.GetIlElle]. Je m'en vais donc, avec réticence, mais à la hâte.
column4: Als ich das Zeichen auf meinem Unterarm offenbarte, in der Erwartung, dass alles nach Plan lief, stolperte [From.GetFirstName] plötzlich schockiert zurück und machte mit der Hand eine schützende Geste. "Das ist Blasphemie, [Root.GetFirstName]", sagte [From.GetSheHe] mit großen Augen. "Geh mir aus den Augen, bevor ich die Wachen rufe!", schrie [From.GetSheHe], und hastig, aber zähneknirschend, machte ich mich von dannen."
column6: Cuando le he enseñado a [From.GetFirstName] la marca que llevo en el antebrazo, ha dado un paso atrás con una mueca de horror y ha hecho un gesto de protección con la mano. "Eso es una blasfemia, [Root.GetFirstName]", ha dicho con los ojos como platos. "¡Vete de aquí antes de que llame a los guardias!". He titubeado y he acabado huyendo."

column2: If I can't turn [From.GetHerHim], no one can.
column3: Si je ne peux pas [From.GetLeLa] convertir, personne ne le peut.
column4: Wenn ich [From.GetHerHim] nicht überreden kann, dann niemanden.
column6: Creo que se trata de una causa perdida.

column2: When I proceeded to reveal the brand on my lower arm, certain that the final hook would sink in, [From.GetFirstName] inhaled sharply, worrying me for a second. "You truly are a [Root.GetDWMagician] then" [From.GetSheHe] says, eager and relieved. "Can you help me [From.GetDWReasonToJoin]?" [From.GetSheHe] continues, eyes pleading.
column3: Quand j'ai commencé à révéler la marque sur mon avant-bras, persuadé[Root.GetNoneE] que [From.GetFirstName] mordra enfin à l'hameçon, [From.GetIlElle] a inspiré brusquement, m'inquiétant pendant une seconde. « Vous êtes vraiment un[Root.GetNoneE] [Root.GetDWMagician] alors », dit-[From.GetIlElle], mêlant l'empressement au soulagement. « Pouvez-vous m'aider à [From.GetDWReasonToJoin] ? » poursuit-[From.GetIlElle], les yeux implorants.
column4: Als ich das Zeichen auf meinem Unterarm offenbarte, in der Erwartung, dass alles nach Plan lief, atmete [From.GetFirstName] plötzlich tief ein, was mir kurz Sorgen bereitete. "Du bist wahrlich ein/e [Root.GetDWMagician]", sagte [From.GetSheHe] neugierig und erleichtert. "Kannst du mir helfen, [From.GetDWReasonToJoin]?", fragte [From.GetSheHe] mit flehenden Augen."
column6: Cuando le he enseñado a [From.GetFirstName] la marca que llevo en el antebrazo, ha lanzado un grito ahogado y me he temido lo peor. Entonces ha preguntado en tono ansioso: "¿De verdad practicas la brujería? ¿Puedes ayudarme a [From.GetDWReasonToJoin]?". He suspirado con alivio."

column2: Patience, [From.GetSisterBrother]. We will speak more soon.
column3: Patience, [From.GetSisterBrother]. Nous parlerons bientôt davantage.
column4: Geduld, [From.GetSisterBrother]. Wir werden uns bald weiter unterhalten.
column6: Paciencia, [From.GetSisterBrother]. Hablaremos pronto.

column2: Write a letter to the coven about §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! induction. [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSocietyRank] §Y[chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName]§! will handle it from here.
column3: Vous écrivez une lettre au sabbat au sujet de l'incorporation de §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!. [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSocietyRank] §Y[chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName]§! prendra le relais dorénavant.
column4: Schreibt einen Brief über die Aufnahme von §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! an den Zirkel. [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSocietyRank] §Y[chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName]§! wird sich um alles Weitere kümmern.
column6: Escribes una carta al aquelarre sobre la iniciación de §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!. §Y[chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName]§! se hará cargo de todo.

column2: We might... If you offer yourself up to [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWDevil], he will grant you powers [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] has kept from us humans. Fingering the leather pouch in my pocket, I slowly nod. "Oh, and I think you'll enjoy it..." [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetSheHe] said, with a knowing smile.
column3: « Nous pourrions... Si vous vous offriez à [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWDevil], il vous accorderait des pouvoirs que [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] ne nous accorderait jamais, à nous les humains ». Touchant l'étui en cuir dans ma poche, je hoche la tête lentement. « Cela dit, je pense que vous apprécierez », me dit-[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetIlElle], avec un sourire entendu.
column4: Vielleicht ... Wenn Ihr Euch dem [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWDevil] opfert, wird er Euch Macht schenken, die Euer sogenannter Gott" uns Menschen nie zugestehen würde. Ich berühre den Lederbeutel in meiner Tasche und nicke langsam. "Ich denke, es wird Euch gefallen", sprach [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetSheHe] mit einem wissenden Lächeln."
column6: Tal vez. Si te consagras a [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWDevil], te brindará todos los poderes que tu supuesto dios nunca nos concedería a los humanos. He asentido mientras acariciaba el zurrón de cuero. Creo que te gustará unirte a nosotros", ha dicho con una sonrisa."

column2: If there is any chance it'll [Root.GetDWReasonToJoin], I will.
column3: S'il y a la moindre chance de [Root.GetDWReasonToJoin], je le ferai.
column4: Wenn es eine Möglichkeit gibt und Ihr könnt [Root.GetDWReasonToJoin], dann möchte ich sie nutzen.
column6: Me uniré a vosotros si eso me ayuda a [Root.GetDWReasonToJoin].

column2: §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! leaves you alone for now  the coven will be in contact with you.\n
column3: §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! vous laisse seul[Root.GetNoneE] pour le moment  le sabbat vous contactera.\n
column4: §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! lässt Euch vorerst allein. Der Zirkel wird mit Euch in Kontakt treten.\n
column6: §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! te deja a solas por el momento. El aquelarre se pondrá en contacto contigo.\n

column2: It has been some time since [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] was in contact with me. I have been mulling over [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetPossPronoun] words. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] told Adam he would die if he ate of the forbidden fruit... [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] lied. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] lie.
column3: Cela fait un certain temps que je n'ai plus été en contact avec [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. J'ai réfléchi à ses paroles. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] a dit à Adam qu'il mourrait s'il mangeait le fruit défendu. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] a menti. Les [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s [Root.GetHouseOfWorshipDuDela] mentent.
column4: Es ist schon einige Zeit her, seitdem [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] mich das letzte Mal kontaktierte. Ich habe mir den Kopf darüber zerbrochen, was [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] wohl von mir denkt, da ich diesen Pfad beschreite, aber [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName] hat mir bereits mehr Unterstützung angeboten, als es [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] jemals getan hätte. Ich habe mit dem Studium okkulter Werke begonnen und bisher scheinen mir die Predigten, die in meinem Gotteshaus gelehrt werden, im Vergleich bestenfalls engstirnig.
column6: Ha pasado un tiempo desde aquella conversación con [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. Desde entonces no he parado de preguntarme qué pensará [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] si me adentro en ese camino... Por otro lado, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName] ya me ha ofrecido más apoyo del que [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] me ha dado. He empezado a estudiar libros sobre ocultismo y me estoy dando cuenta de cuan intransigentes eran los preceptos que me habían enseñado hasta ahora.

column2: It has been some time since [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] was in contact with me. I have been pondering what [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] would think of me for venturing down this path, but [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName] has already offered me more support than [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] ever has. I have begun studying books on the Ruinous Powers and so far I'm finding the views preached at the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] to be narrow-minded, at best.
column3: Cela fait un certain temps que je n'ai plus été en contact avec [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. Je me suis demandé ce que [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] pensait de moi m'aventurant sur ce chemin, mais [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName] m'a déjà offert plus de soutien que [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] ne l'a jamais fait. J'ai commencé à étudier les livres sur l'occulte, car jusqu'ici, j'ai trouvé étroites d'esprit, au mieux, les idées exprimées [Root.GetHouseOfWorship].
column4: Es ist schon einige Zeit her, seitdem [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] mich das letzte Mal kontaktierte. Ich habe mir den Kopf darüber zerbrochen, was [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] wohl von mir denkt, da ich diesen Pfad beschreite, aber [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName] hat mir bereits mehr Unterstützung angeboten, als es [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] jemals getan hätte. Ich habe mit dem Studium okkulter Werke begonnen und bisher scheinen mir die Predigten, die in meinem Gotteshaus gelehrt werden, im Vergleich bestenfalls engstirnig.
column6: Ha pasado un tiempo desde aquella conversación con [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. Desde entonces no he parado de preguntarme qué pensará [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] si me adentro en ese camino... Por otro lado, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName] ya me ha ofrecido más apoyo del que [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] me ha dado. He empezado a estudiar libros sobre ocultismo y me estoy dando cuenta de cuan intransigentes eran los preceptos que me habían enseñado hasta ahora.

column2: Their lies are meant to hold us back!
column3: Leurs mensonges sont faits pour avoir une emprise sur nous !
column4: Ich habe mich von schönen Reden einlullen lassen!
column6: He dejado que me cegaran con convenciones.

column2: You continue to await further instruction.\n
column3: Vous continuez à attendre de nouvelles instructions.\n
column4: Ihr wartet auf weitere Anweisungen.\n
column6: Sigues a la espera de instrucciones.\n

column2: I can't believe I have been so gullible.
column3: Je ne peux pas croire que j'ai été aussi crédule.
column4: Nicht zu glauben, dass ich so einfältig war.
column6: Hasta ahora he sido terriblemente inocente

column2: I am beginning to feel that I have been missing out...
column3: Je commence à croire que j'ai été oublié[Root.GetNoneE]...
column4: Langsam denke ich, dass mir einiges entgangen ist ...
column6: podría decirse que tenía una venda sobre los ojos.

column2: Why must we always put the needs of others before our own...?
column3: Pourquoi toujours placer les besoins des autres avant les nôtres ?
column4: Warum müssen wir immer die Bedürfnisse anderer unseren eigenen voranstellen ...?
column6: ¿Por qué siempre ponemos por delante las necesidades de los demás?

column2: I found some cryptic scrawlings written in blood on my bedroom door this morning. The guards say they haven't seen anyone enter during the night and I dare not ask my [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] to decipher it. Yet, I think I understand.. the mark of [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWDevil].
column3: Un message inintelligible écrit avec du sang est apparu sur la porte de ma chambre ce matin. Les gardes disent qu'ils n'ont vu entrer personne pendant la nuit, et je n'ose pas demander à m[Root.job_spiritual.GetOnA] [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] de le déchiffrer. Quoique je pense que je reconnais le pentagramme... c'est la marque [Root.GetEvilGodDuDelaDes].
column4: Auf meiner Zimmertür ist diesen Morgen eine unlesbare, in Blut geschriebene Nachricht erschienen. Die Wachen sagen, sie hätten in der Nacht keinen Eindringling entdeckt, und ich wage es nicht, meine Gelehrten darauf anzusetzen. Stattdessen habe ich schnell meine geheimen Bücher aufgesucht, um nach bekannten Symbolen zu forschen. "[Root.GetDWDevil] verlangt deine Lebenskraft", ist alles, was ich lesen kann."
column6: Esta mañana ha aparecido en mi habitación un mensaje indescifrable escrito con sangre. Los guardias me han asegurado que no han visto a nadie entrar durante la noche y no me he atrevido a consultarlo con mis eruditos. He ido corriendo a mis libros secretos para tratar de descifrar los símbolos, pero solo he logrado transcribir una parte: "[Root.GetDWDevil] reclama tu fuerza vital"."

column2: I found some cryptic scrawlings written in blood on my bedroom door this morning. The guards say they haven't seen anyone enter during the night and I dare not ask my [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] to decipher it. Yet, I think I understand.. the mark of [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWDevil].
column3: Un message inintelligible écrit avec du sang est apparu sur la porte de ma chambre ce matin. Les gardes disent qu'ils n'ont vu entrer personne pendant la nuit, et je n'ose pas demander à m[Root.job_spiritual.GetOnA] [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] de le déchiffrer. Quoique je pense que je reconnais le pentagramme... c'est la marque [Root.GetEvilGodDuDelaDes].
